fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, Culture, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Transport
eu_initiatives:
- Civil justice 
- Living and working in another EU countries 
- Youth & the world 
- International Cooperation on education and training 
- Culture sector support
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
1. To know the law of EU and lead the Chinese people living in different countries to know the law of the counties and provide the law help for all members of the associations. 
2. EFCO will encourage European Chinese to keep good relationship with the local European, encourage young Chinese people enter the main society of Europe. Therefore they can communicate each other in education, skill training and job etc.  
3. EFCO always keep the Chinese culture and promote it in Europe which helps European Chinese know their own culture deeply and culture exchange with European people. 
4. To Strengthen economic and trade cooperation with China and Asia and organize European Chinese to actively participate in the economic and trade cooperation between the EU and China and carry out useful work.
relevant_communication:
1. Chinese Education 
2. Support the communication activities among the youth with different culture background 
3. Provide the legal support to the European Chinese especially to the Chinese businessmen who have their own business in EU countries. 
4. Support the European Chinese women have equal right with the men. 
5. Support protection of the minority's right 
6. The communication with China side and EU about culture exchange and cooperation in electronic information and Chinese education fields. 
7. To help Chinese artists and culture related people to have their own exhibitions in EU countries to promote Chinese culture.
